/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white bus, adorned with blue and red stripes, is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. People can be spotted walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are green, gray, and white, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
